sections.executive_summary:
ReportSection(title='Executive Summary', content='

Executive Summary

The drone mission successfully scanned 6 field zones and executed 4 precision agriculture actions. The overall crop health assessment shows 33.3% of zones in healthy condition with an average NDVI of 0.43.

A total of 1.4L of treatment materials were applied across the field, demonstrating efficient resource utilization for precision agriculture.

', charts=[], insights=['Poor crop health requiring immediate intervention', 'Moderate vegetation index with room for improvement'], recommendations=['Implement comprehensive disease management program', 'Optimize irrigation and fertilization schedules', 'High intervention rate - review preventive measures'])
sections.crop_health:
ReportSection(title='Crop Health Analysis', content='

Crop Health Analysis

Health Status Distribution

  • Healthy: 33.3%
  • Diseased: 16.7%
  • Pest-affected: 50.0%

NDVI Statistics

  • Mean NDVI: 0.428
  • Standard Deviation: 0.097
  • Range: 0.269 - 0.531
  • Median: 0.436

Moisture Analysis

  • Mean Moisture: 56.6%
  • Standard Deviation: 10.7%
  • Range: 45.3% - 74.7%
', charts=['data/mock_data/charts\crop_health_analysis.png', 'data/mock_data/charts\ndvi_moisture_correlation.png'], insights=[], recommendations=['Apply integrated pest management strategies', 'Optimize fertilization program to improve plant vigor'])
sections.precision_agriculture:
ReportSection(title='Precision Agriculture Analysis', content='

Precision Agriculture Analysis

Spraying Summary

  • Total Actions: 4
  • Success Rate: 100.0%
  • Total Spray Used: 1.4L
  • Average Quantity per Action: 0.35L

Action Type Breakdown

  • Pesticide: 4 actions, 1.4L total
', charts=['data/mock_data/charts\precision_agriculture_analysis.png', 'data/mock_data/charts\efficiency_metrics.png'], insights=['Excellent mission success rate indicating reliable drone operations'], recommendations=['High pesticide usage - consider integrated pest management', 'Implement variable rate application based on zone-specific needs'])
sections.trend_analysis:
ReportSection(title='Trend Analysis', content='

Trend Analysis

Health Trends

  • Healthy Crop Trend: nan% change per day
  • NDVI Trend: nan% change per day

Forecasting

Based on current trends, the field is showing negative health progression. Immediate intervention may be required to reverse the trend.

', charts=['data/mock_data/charts\trend_analysis.png'], insights=[], recommendations=['Continue regular monitoring to track trend improvements'])

overall_insights: Excellent mission success rate indicating reliable drone operations
Poor crop health requiring immediate intervention
Moderate vegetation index with room for improvement
priority_recommendations: High intervention rate - review preventive measures
Continue regular monitoring to track trend improvements
High pesticide usage - consider integrated pest management
Implement variable rate application based on zone-specific needs
Optimize fertilization program to improve plant vigor
next_steps: Schedule follow-up drone mission in 7 days to monitor progress
Update irrigation schedule based on moisture analysis
Document treatment outcomes for future reference
Plan next monitoring cycle based on crop growth stage
